channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-15633] Backport HBASE-15507 to branch-1
item.description:
HBASE-15507 introduced an update_peer_config method to allow online changes to replication config. It depended on HBASE-11393, which so far exists only in master and can only be in 2.0 and above because of some incompatible changes to replication peer config serialization.

To get this in branch-1 will require two things:
1. Port the PeerConfigTracker in HBASE-11393 to branch-1 without taking the incompatible tableCF serialization changes.
2. Port HBASE-15507's logic on top of this.

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: Backported PeerConfigTracker from HBASE-11393 and all of HBASE-15507 to branch-1.

-1 overall

TestReplicationAdminWithClusters, which timed out in the above Hadoop QA run, is the one of the relevant tests for this patch. I can't reproduce the issue locally however; it passes in both IDE and command line Maven (and passed Hadoop QA in HBASE-15507, which the majority of this patch comes from). I'm going to submit the patch to QA again to see if this is a consistent failure.

customfieldvalues.customfieldvalue: Added update_peer_config to the HBase shell and ReplicationAdmin, and provided a callback for custom replication endpoints to be notified of changes to their configuration and peer data
